name: Cisco | IOS | Network | DOCSIS | Invalid DOCSIS Message #1 (SYSLOG)
description: %UBR7200-5-BADMNCSMSG: Invalid DOCSIS Message received from a Cable Modem for interface Cable1/0

patterns.value_re: %UBR\d+00-5-BADMNCSMSG: Invalid DOCSIS Message received from a Cable Modem for interface (?P<interface>.+)$

name: Cisco | IOS | Network | DOCSIS | Invalid DOCSIS Message #2 (SYSLOG)
description: %UBR7200-5-NOTIMPLMENTEDMNCSMSG: Not implemented DOCSIS MESSAGE received from a Cable Modem for interface Cable1/0

patterns.value_re: %UBR\d+00-5-NOTIMPLMENTEDMNCSMSG: Not implemented DOCSIS MESSAGE received from a Cable Modem for interface (?P<interface>.+)

name: Cisco | IOS | Network | DOCSIS | Invalid DOCSIS Message #3 (SYSLOG)
description: First fragment is lost or discarded.  Discard fragment.  SID = 50

patterns.value_re: First fragment is lost or discarded.  Discard fragment.  SID = (?P<sid>\d+)$

name: Cisco | IOS | Network | DOCSIS | Bad Timing Offset (SYSLOG)
description: %UBR7200-4-BADTXOFFSET: Bad timing offset 1000 detected for cable modem 0018.c0d8.9614.

patterns.value_re: %UBR\d+00-4-BADTXOFFSET: Bad timing offset \d+ detected for cable modem (?P<mac>\S+)\.$

name: Cisco | IOS | Network | DOCSIS | Max CPE Reached (SYSLOG)
description: %UBR7200-5-MAXHOST: New host with IP address 192.168.0.2 and MAC 0018.c0d8.9614 on SID 50 is ignored.

patterns.value_re: %UBR\d+00-5-MAXHOST: New host with IP address (?P<ip>\S+) and MAC (?P<mac>\S+) on SID (?P<sid>\d+) is ignored\.$

name: Cisco | IOS | Network | DOCSIS | Invalid Shared Secret (SYSLOG)
description: %UBR7200-5-AUTHFAIL: Authorization failed for Cable Modem 0018.c0d8.9614 on interface Cable1/0

patterns.value_re: %UBR\d+00-5-AUTHFAIL: Authorization failed for Cable Modem (?P<mac>\S+) on interface (?P<interface>.+)

name: Cisco | IOS | Network | DOCSIS | BPI Unautorized (SYSLOG)
description: %UBR7200-5-UNAUTHSIDTIMEOUT: CMTS deleted BPI unauthorized Cable Modem 0018.c0d8.9614

patterns.value_re: %UBR\d+00-5-UNAUTHSIDTIMEOUT: CMTS deleted BPI unauthorized Cable Modem (?P<mac>\S+)

name: Cisco | IOS | Network | DOCSIS | Invalid CoS (SYSLOG)
description: %UBR7200-5-CLASSFAIL: Registration failed for Cable Modem 0018.c0d8.9614 on interface Cable1/0/U0: abcd

patterns.value_re: %UBR\d+00-5-CLASSFAIL: Registration failed for Cable Modem (?P<mac>\S+) on interface (?P<interface>.+):

name: Cisco | IOS | Network | DOCSIS | Maximum SIDs (SYSLOG)
description: %UBR7200-3-NOMORESIDS: Maximum number of SIDS have been allocated for interface Cable1/0

patterns.value_re: %UBR\d+00-3-NOMORESIDS: Maximum number of SIDS have been allocated for interface (?P<interface>.+)

name: Cisco | IOS | Network | DOCSIS | Maximum Capacity Reached (SYSLOG)
description: %UBR7200-5-OVERLIMIT: Interface Cable1/0 Current total reservation of 20000 bps on Port U0, exceeds its maximum configured reservation limit of 19000 bps

patterns.value_re: %UBR\d+00-5-OVERLIMIT: Interface (?P<interface>.+).Current total reservation of (?P<cur_bps>\d+) bps on Port (?P<upstream>U\d+), exceeds its.+maximum configured reservation limit of (?P<res_bps>\d+) bps

name: Cisco | IOS | Network | DOCSIS | Unregistered Modem Deleted (SYSLOG)
